036package org.jfree.chart.legend;
037
038import java.awt.GradientPaint;
039import java.awt.Graphics2D;
040import java.awt.Paint;
041import java.awt.Shape;
042import java.awt.Stroke;
043import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
044import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
045import java.io.IOException;
046import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
047import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
048import java.util.Objects;
049
050import org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractBlock;
051import org.jfree.chart.block.Block;
052import org.jfree.chart.block.LengthConstraintType;
053import org.jfree.chart.block.RectangleConstraint;
054import org.jfree.chart.util.GradientPaintTransformer;
055import org.jfree.chart.api.RectangleAnchor;
056import org.jfree.chart.block.Size2D;
057import org.jfree.chart.util.StandardGradientPaintTransformer;
058import org.jfree.chart.internal.PaintUtils;
059import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
060import org.jfree.chart.api.PublicCloneable;
061import org.jfree.chart.internal.CloneUtils;
062import org.jfree.chart.internal.SerialUtils;
063import org.jfree.chart.internal.ShapeUtils;
064
065/**
066 * The graphical item within a legend item.
067 */
068public class LegendGraphic extends AbstractBlock
069                           implements Block, PublicCloneable {
070
071    private LegendGraphicProduct legendGraphicProduct = new LegendGraphicProduct();
072
073        /** For serialization. */
074    static final long serialVersionUID = -1338791523854985009L;
075
076    /**
077     * A flag that controls whether or not the shape is visible - see also
078     * lineVisible.
079     */
080    private boolean shapeVisible;
081
082    /**
083     * The shape to display.  To allow for accurate positioning, the center
084     * of the shape should be at (0, 0).
085     */
086    private transient Shape shape;
087
088    /** A flag that controls whether or not the shape is filled. */
089    private boolean shapeFilled;
090
091    /** The fill paint for the shape. */
092    private transient Paint fillPaint;
093
094    /** A flag that controls whether or not the shape outline is visible. */
095    private boolean shapeOutlineVisible;
096
097    /** The outline paint for the shape. */
098    private transient Paint outlinePaint;
099
100    /** The outline stroke for the shape. */
101    private transient Stroke outlineStroke;
102
103    /**
104     * A flag that controls whether or not the line is visible - see also
105     * shapeVisible.
106     */
107    private boolean lineVisible;
108
109    /** The line. */
110    private transient Shape line;
111
112    /** The line stroke. */
113    private transient Stroke lineStroke;
114
115    /** The line paint. */
116    private transient Paint linePaint;
117
118    /**
119     * Creates a new legend graphic.
120     *
121     * @param shape  the shape ({@code null} not permitted).
122     * @param fillPaint  the fill paint ({@code null} not permitted).
123     */
124    public LegendGraphic(Shape shape, Paint fillPaint) {
125        Args.nullNotPermitted(shape, "shape");
126        Args.nullNotPermitted(fillPaint, "fillPaint");
127        this.shapeVisible = true;
128        this.shape = shape;
129        legendGraphicProduct.setShapeAnchor2(RectangleAnchor.CENTER);
130        legendGraphicProduct.setShapeLocation2(RectangleAnchor.CENTER);
131        this.shapeFilled = true;
132        this.fillPaint = fillPaint;
133        legendGraphicProduct.setFillPaintTransformer2(new StandardGradientPaintTransformer());
134        setPadding(2.0, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0);
135    }
136
137    /**
138     * Returns a flag that controls whether or not the shape
139     * is visible.
140     *
141     * @return A boolean.
142     *
143     * @see #setShapeVisible(boolean)
144     */
145    public boolean isShapeVisible() {
146        return this.shapeVisible;
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Sets a flag that controls whether or not the shape is
151     * visible.
152     *
153     * @param visible  the flag.
154     *
155     * @see #isShapeVisible()
156     */
157    public void setShapeVisible(boolean visible) {
158        this.shapeVisible = visible;
159    }
160

162     * Returns the shape.

164     * @return The shape.

169        return this.shape;
170    }

180        this.shape = shape;
181    }
182

193    }

205    }

236     */
237    public GradientPaintTransformer getFillPaintTransformer() {
238        return this.legendGraphicProduct.getFillPaintTransformer();
239    }

241    /**
242     * Sets the transformer used when the fill paint is an instance of

246     *
247     * @see #getFillPaintTransformer()
248     */
249    public void setFillPaintTransformer(GradientPaintTransformer transformer) {
250        legendGraphicProduct.setFillPaintTransformer(transformer);
251    }

321     * Returns the shape anchor.
322     *
323     * @return The shape anchor.
324     *

328        return this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeAnchor();
329    }
330
331    /**
332     * Sets the shape anchor.  This defines a point on the shapes bounding
333     * rectangle that will be used to align the shape to a location.
334     *
335     * @param anchor  the anchor ({@code null} not permitted).
336     *
337     * @see #setShapeAnchor(RectangleAnchor)
338     */
339    public void setShapeAnchor(RectangleAnchor anchor) {
340        legendGraphicProduct.setShapeAnchor(anchor);
341    }
342

344     * Returns the shape location.
345     *
346     * @return The shape location.
347     *
348     * @see #setShapeLocation(RectangleAnchor)
349     */
350    public RectangleAnchor getShapeLocation() {
351        return this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeLocation();
352    }
353
354    /**
355     * Sets the shape location.  This defines a point within the drawing
356     * area that will be used to align the shape to.
357     *
358     * @param location  the location ({@code null} not permitted).
359     *
360     * @see #getShapeLocation()
361     */
362    public void setShapeLocation(RectangleAnchor location) {
363        legendGraphicProduct.setShapeLocation(location);
364    }

366    /**
367     * Returns the flag that controls whether or not the line is visible.
368     *
369     * @return A boolean.
370     *
371     * @see #setLineVisible(boolean)
372     */
373    public boolean isLineVisible() {
374        return this.lineVisible;
375    }
376
377    /**
378     * Sets the flag that controls whether or not the line is visible.
379     *
380     * @param visible  the flag.
381     *
382     * @see #isLineVisible()
383     */
384    public void setLineVisible(boolean visible) {
385        this.lineVisible = visible;
386    }
387
388    /**
389     * Returns the line centered about (0, 0).
390     *
391     * @return The line.
392     *
393     * @see #setLine(Shape)
394     */
395    public Shape getLine() {
396        return this.line;
397    }
398
399    /**
400     * Sets the line.  A Shape is used here, because then you can use Line2D,
401     * GeneralPath or any other Shape to represent the line.
402     *
403     * @param line  the line.
404     *
405     * @see #getLine()
406     */
407    public void setLine(Shape line) {
408        this.line = line;
409    }
410
411    /**
412     * Returns the line paint.
413     *
414     * @return The paint.
415     *
416     * @see #setLinePaint(Paint)
417     */
418    public Paint getLinePaint() {
419        return this.linePaint;
420    }
421
422    /**
423     * Sets the line paint.
424     *
425     * @param paint  the paint.
426     *
427     * @see #getLinePaint()
428     */
429    public void setLinePaint(Paint paint) {
430        this.linePaint = paint;
431    }
432
433    /**
434     * Returns the line stroke.
435     *
436     * @return The stroke.
437     *
438     * @see #setLineStroke(Stroke)
439     */
440    public Stroke getLineStroke() {
441        return this.lineStroke;
442    }
443
444    /**
445     * Sets the line stroke.
446     *
447     * @param stroke  the stroke.
448     *
449     * @see #getLineStroke()
450     */
451    public void setLineStroke(Stroke stroke) {
452        this.lineStroke = stroke;
453    }
454
455    /**
456     * Arranges the contents of the block, within the given constraints, and
457     * returns the block size.
458     *
459     * @param g2  the graphics device.
460     * @param constraint  the constraint ({@code null} not permitted).
461     *
462     * @return The block size (in Java2D units, never {@code null}).
463     */
464    @Override
465    public Size2D arrange(Graphics2D g2, RectangleConstraint constraint) {
466        RectangleConstraint contentConstraint = toContentConstraint(constraint);
467        LengthConstraintType w = contentConstraint.getWidthConstraintType();
468        LengthConstraintType h = contentConstraint.getHeightConstraintType();
469        Size2D contentSize = null;
470        switch (w) {
471            case NONE:
472                if (h == LengthConstraintType.NONE) {
473                    contentSize = arrangeNN(g2);
474                }
475                else if (h == LengthConstraintType.RANGE) {
476                    throw new RuntimeException("Not yet implemented.");
477                }
478                else if (h == LengthConstraintType.FIXED) {
479                    throw new RuntimeException("Not yet implemented.");
480                }   break;
481            case RANGE:
482                if (h == LengthConstraintType.NONE) {
483                    throw new RuntimeException("Not yet implemented.");
484                }
485                else if (h == LengthConstraintType.RANGE) {
486                    throw new RuntimeException("Not yet implemented.");
487                }
488                else if (h == LengthConstraintType.FIXED) {
489                    throw new RuntimeException("Not yet implemented.");
490                }   break;
491            case FIXED:
492                if (h == LengthConstraintType.NONE) {
493                    throw new RuntimeException("Not yet implemented.");
494                }
495                else if (h == LengthConstraintType.RANGE) {
496                    throw new RuntimeException("Not yet implemented.");
497                }
498                else if (h == LengthConstraintType.FIXED) {
499                    contentSize = new Size2D(contentConstraint.getWidth(),
500                            contentConstraint.getHeight());
501                }   break;
502            default:
503                throw new IllegalStateException("Unrecognised widthConstraintType.");
504        }
505        assert contentSize != null;
506        return new Size2D(calculateTotalWidth(contentSize.getWidth()),
507                calculateTotalHeight(contentSize.getHeight()));
508    }
509
510    /**
511     * Performs the layout with no constraint, so the content size is
512     * determined by the bounds of the shape and/or line drawn to represent
513     * the series.
514     *
515     * @param g2  the graphics device.
516     *
517     * @return  The content size.
518     */
519    protected Size2D arrangeNN(Graphics2D g2) {
520        Rectangle2D contentSize = new Rectangle2D.Double();
521        if (this.line != null) {
522            contentSize.setRect(this.line.getBounds2D());
523        }
524        if (this.shape != null) {
525            contentSize = contentSize.createUnion(this.shape.getBounds2D());
526        }
527        return new Size2D(contentSize.getWidth(), contentSize.getHeight());
528    }
529
530    /**
531     * Draws the graphic item within the specified area.
532     *
533     * @param g2  the graphics device.
534     * @param area  the area.
535     */
536    @Override
537    public void draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area) {
538
539        area = trimMargin(area);
540        drawBorder(g2, area);
541        area = trimBorder(area);
542        area = trimPadding(area);
543
544        if (this.lineVisible) {
545            Point2D location = this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeLocation().getAnchorPoint(area);
546            Shape aLine = ShapeUtils.createTranslatedShape(getLine(),
547                    this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeAnchor(), location.getX(), location.getY());
548            g2.setPaint(this.linePaint);
549            g2.setStroke(this.lineStroke);
550            g2.draw(aLine);
551        }
552
553        if (this.shapeVisible) {
554            Point2D location = this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeLocation().getAnchorPoint(area);
555
556            Shape s = ShapeUtils.createTranslatedShape(this.shape,
557                    this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeAnchor(), location.getX(), location.getY());
558            if (this.shapeFilled) {
559                Paint p = p(s);
560                                        g2.setPaint(p);
561
562                g2.fill(s);
563            }
564            if (this.shapeOutlineVisible) {
565                g2.setPaint(this.outlinePaint);
566                g2.setStroke(this.outlineStroke);
567                g2.draw(s);
568            }
569        }
570    }
571
572        private Paint p(Shape s) {
573                Paint p = this.fillPaint;
574                if (p instanceof GradientPaint) {
575                        GradientPaint gp = (GradientPaint) this.fillPaint;
576                        p = this.legendGraphicProduct.getFillPaintTransformer().transform(gp, s);
577                }
578                return p;
579        }
580
581    /**
582     * Draws the block within the specified area.
583     *
584     * @param g2  the graphics device.
585     * @param area  the area.
586     * @param params  ignored ({@code null} permitted).
587     *
588     * @return Always {@code null}.
589     */
590    @Override
591    public Object draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area, Object params) {
592        draw(g2, area);
593        return null;
594    }
595
596    /**
597     * Tests this {@code LegendGraphic} instance for equality with an
598     * arbitrary object.
599     *
600     * @param obj  the object ({@code null} permitted).
601     *
602     * @return A boolean.
603     */
604    @Override
605    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
606        if (!(obj instanceof LegendGraphic)) {
607            return false;
608        }
609        LegendGraphic that = (LegendGraphic) obj;
610        if (this.shapeVisible != that.shapeVisible) {
611            return false;
612        }
613        if (!ShapeUtils.equal(this.shape, that.shape)) {
614            return false;
615        }
616        if (this.shapeFilled != that.shapeFilled) {
617            return false;
618        }
619        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.fillPaint, that.fillPaint)) {
620            return false;
621        }
622        if (!Objects.equals(this.legendGraphicProduct.getFillPaintTransformer(), that.legendGraphicProduct.getFillPaintTransformer())) {
623            return false;
624        }
625        if (this.shapeOutlineVisible != that.shapeOutlineVisible) {
626            return false;
627        }
628        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.outlinePaint, that.outlinePaint)) {
629            return false;
630        }
631        if (!Objects.equals(this.outlineStroke, that.outlineStroke)) {
632            return false;
633        }
634        if (this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeAnchor() != that.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeAnchor()) {
635            return false;
636        }
637        if (this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeLocation() != that.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeLocation()) {
638            return false;
639        }
640        if (this.lineVisible != that.lineVisible) {
641            return false;
642        }
643        if (!ShapeUtils.equal(this.line, that.line)) {
644            return false;
645        }
646        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.linePaint, that.linePaint)) {
647            return false;
648        }
649        if (!Objects.equals(this.lineStroke, that.lineStroke)) {
650            return false;
651        }
652        return super.equals(obj);
653    }
654
655    /**
656     * Returns a hash code for this instance.
657     *
658     * @return A hash code.
659     */
660    @Override
661    public int hashCode() {
662        int hash = 7;
663        hash = 89 * hash + (this.shapeVisible ? 1 : 0);
664        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.shape);
665        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeLocation());
666        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.legendGraphicProduct.getShapeAnchor());
667        hash = 89 * hash + (this.shapeFilled ? 1 : 0);
668        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.fillPaint);
669        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.legendGraphicProduct.getFillPaintTransformer());
670        hash = 89 * hash + (this.shapeOutlineVisible ? 1 : 0);
671        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.outlinePaint);
672        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.outlineStroke);
673        hash = 89 * hash + (this.lineVisible ? 1 : 0);
674        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.line);
675        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.lineStroke);
676        hash = 89 * hash + Objects.hashCode(this.linePaint);
677        return hash;
678    }
679
680    /**
681     * Returns a clone of this {@code LegendGraphic} instance.
682     *
683     * @return A clone of this {@code LegendGraphic} instance.
684     *
685     * @throws CloneNotSupportedException if there is a problem cloning.
686     */
687    @Override
688    public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
689        LegendGraphic clone = (LegendGraphic) super.clone();
690                clone.legendGraphicProduct = (LegendGraphicProduct) this.legendGraphicProduct.clone();
691        clone.shape = CloneUtils.clone(this.shape);
692        clone.line = CloneUtils.clone(this.line);
693        return clone;
694    }
695
696    /**
697     * Provides serialization support.
698     *
699     * @param stream  the output stream.
700     *
701     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O error.
702     */
703    private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
704        stream.defaultWriteObject();
705        SerialUtils.writeShape(this.shape, stream);
706        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.fillPaint, stream);
707        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.outlinePaint, stream);
708        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.outlineStroke, stream);
709        SerialUtils.writeShape(this.line, stream);
710        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.linePaint, stream);
711        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.lineStroke, stream);
712    }
713
714    /**
715     * Provides serialization support.
716     *
717     * @param stream  the input stream.
718     *
719     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O error.
720     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a classpath problem.
721     */
722    private void readObject(ObjectInputStream stream)
723            throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
724        stream.defaultReadObject();
725        this.shape = SerialUtils.readShape(stream);
726        this.fillPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
727        this.outlinePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
728        this.outlineStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
729        this.line = SerialUtils.readShape(stream);
730        this.linePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
731        this.lineStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
732    }
733
734}
